comments.body: Definitely interested in each of these patches either having good comments, or a xref to a patch to the repo.
I added a comment for all patches

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@  url: http://download.qt-project.org/official_releases/qt/4.8/{{ version }}/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: d990ee66bf7ab0c785589776f35ba6ad
  patches:
    # Make Qt accept its open source license without user interaction
    - acceptance.patch
